description.narrative: By 2025, Children and families in urban areas have equitable access to basic WASH services including in humanitarian situations. , which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 'By 2025 children and their families in rural and urban areas use safe, affordable and sustainable water, sanitation and practice appropriate hygiene
